content:
If Android, install the Thunderbird app. If iPhone, wait for the development of the Thunderbird app to be finished.

Other e-mail apps will work too. You just have to set up your account in them.

content: Messages are stored in mbox files, not as individual files. After deleting messages, you can recover the space by compacting the folder.

content: È probabile, ma non lo devi chiedere qui quanto al fornitore della tua casella email. Di solito basta pagare qualche euro al mese per avere più spazio.

content: Please clarify how you recreated a deleted folder yet seem to have retained all the content. Can you do a screenshot of the profile folder and one of the imapmail\<accountname> folder, and, if appropriate, one of the Mail\<POPaccount> folder? The more that we can see, the more likely we can assist.
creator: davidsk

content: Your addressbook is not a white list. If some messages are treated as spam, it might be the IP addresses of the sender or other issue. To guarantee such messages do not go to spam, I suggest creating a filter for this.

content:
rnovak said
Hello Thunderbird team, Would it be possible to specify the security fixes in the “Update” releases for Thunderbird/Firefox products in more detail—i.e., which versions are affected? For Windows, macOS, Linux, BSD, etc., and for which category, e.g., desktop or mobile version? That would be really great and useful. This information is not readily available or requires unnecessary effort to find online. Many, many thanks – RN

content: It depends on what folder they are in. The unified folder only displays folders that appear in multiple accounts.

content: Inbox! I was talking about inbox.
creator: ssocos

content: If the missing message is in a different account, it may be that the unified folder needs to be updated to reflect it. You can check this by highlighting the unified inbox, rightclick, select the 'choose' button and see if that account has a tickmark.
creator: davidsk

content:
Hi Ron,

When composing a new email, you can enable the Composition toolbar with View -> Toolbars -> Composition Toolbar from the menu. If you don't have the menu enabled, you can open it via Alt+V (that opens the View menu).

By the way, you can also use Ctrl+Enter to send the e-mail.

Regards, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs

content:
Try to rebuild the index file of the troubled folder.

Right-click the folder - Properties - Repair Folder

content:
Hi,

Thunderbird 38 is a decade old at this point, even if you managed to connect to the add-ons site, how useful would that be for you? Most add-ons will be unsupported anyway.

If you have to use such an ancient version, you should be able to install add-ons manually from downloaded XPI files.

Regards, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs

content: Version 38 is only used for the initial installation and import of Outlook mail (per Mozilla's tech article). My intent is to upgrade to the latest version. I thought it might be better to get all the errors resolved before performing the upgrade. However, if you're recommending upgrading in order to resolve the issue then I'll do it.
creator: HardwareGuy66

content: Well, that explains it. In that case I'd definitely recommend upgrading first, and installing add-ons as the last step.
creator: meskobalazs

content: Thanks. I'll definitely be back if upgrading doesn't resolve the issue.
